meanings.sent1: The leaf outfloats the twig on the water.
meanings.sent2: The balloon outfloats the kite in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The rubber duck outfloats the plastic boat in the bathtub.
meanings.sent4: Her determination outfloats any obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The feather gracefully outfloats the pebble in the stream.

meanings.sent1: The paper boat outfloats the paper airplane in the pool.
meanings.sent2: The log outfloats the stick in the pond.
meanings.sent3: The bubble outfloats the soap foam in the bath.
meanings.sent4: His optimism always outfloats any negativity around him.
meanings.sent5: The cork effortlessly outfloats the metal key in the water.

meanings.definition: Floating objects that surpass others in floating.
meanings.sent1: The outfloats in the pond are the colorful rubber ducks.
meanings.sent2: Among the outfloats in the lake, the buoy stands out.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the outfloats title was fierce among the pool toys.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of outfloats, the lifebuoy is a beacon of safety.
meanings.sent5: The outfloats in the river include the floating logs and plastic bottles.
